item.title: JPMorgan upgrades Super Micro to hold rating on Nvidia Blackwell chip ramp
item.description: Analyst Samik Chatterjee upgraded Super Micro shares to neutral from underweight and lifted his price target by $10 to $45.

item.title: Goldman upgrades this conglomerate, sees 20% upside
item.description: Danaher shares are finally trading at a more attractive valuation, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Accenture is DOGE's first corporate casualty as shares dive on warning that contracts will be cut
item.description: Shares of Accenture slid more than 7% on Thursday after the consulting firm said tighter federal spending efforts have begun to weigh on its revenues.

item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks' attempt at extending the post-Fed rally failed on Thursday, with all three major averages notching modest losses. Here's what CNBC is watching...

item.title: Top Tesla analyst cuts target on falling sales, but keeps buy rating
item.description: Analyst Adam Jonas lowered his price target on shares to $410 from $430, citing lower delivery projections for Tesla.
